# Section

- one, *two*, **three**

```{r}
truth_table <- function(x) {
  vars <- unique(unlist(strsplit(x, "[^a-zA-Z]+")))
  vars <- vars[vars != ""]
  perm <- expand.grid(rep(list(c(FALSE, TRUE)), length(vars)))
  names(perm) <- vars
  perm[ , x] <- with(perm, eval(parse(text = x)))
  perm
}

truth_table("!(P | Q)")
```
